frontmatter.title: Clickjacking Using Iframes: A Case Study
frontmatter.description: Having been around since 2002, Clickjacking or 'UI redressing' is technique that utilizes multiple opaque or transparent layers, usually iframes, to trick users into clicking buttons or entering information without any malicious intent.
